title: Himi 355
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ko e fekau eni,
‘A hotau ‘Otua,
Ki he kakai ‘o māmani,
Ke fakatomala.
2.
Mou fei mo tokanga,
‘O fakatomala;
Pea fai talangofua,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.
3.
Tau fakatomala,
Pea lotu kumi,
‘A e fakamolemole,
‘O e angahala.
4.
He kuo kotofa,
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
‘A e ‘aho ke fakamaau,
Kia kitautolu.
5.
Ko e hao’anga,
Ki he halaia,
Ko e tui kia Sīsū,
Mo ‘ene pekia.
6.
Ko e ung’anga
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio,
Ki he kakai angahala
Ki honau ‘Otua. *
